commands.no-permission: You do not have permission to execute that command.
commands.incorrect-usage: Incorrect usage, the correct usage is: `%s`

add.success: Successfully added `%s` to the faq database.
add.failure: Could not add `%s` to the faq database.

remove.success: Successfully removed `%s` from the faq database.
remove.failure: Could not remove `%s` from the faq database.

get.failure: Could not retrieve `%s` from the faq database.

status.success: :white_check_mark: The eCloud is up and running.
status.failure: :warning: The eCloud appears to be offline, please contact a staff member.

get.failure: :warning: There was an error when trying to process your request, either the eCloud is down or the expansion you specified doesn't exist.

warn.invalid-id: You did not specify a user ID.
warn.invalid-user: The user ID you've specified doesn't exist.

giveaway.winner: Congratulations %s, you've one %s. Please contact %s to retrieve your prize.

message: Your latest message is not following the requirements for %s.
Please edit your message below to fit the requirements:
backup-message: **THIS MESSAGE WILL BE REMOVED IN 30 SECONDS!**
%s Your message does not follow the requirements for %s, please read this:

request-free.topic: Request free services - Building/Developing/Artists/SysAdmin and more. Read the pin!
channel-message: :tools: Welcome to the Unpaid Request Services channel!
**Template:** (Follow this template or your message will be removed)
requirements: - This is only for requesting services, do not reply to services here.
- If you wish to complete a request. DM Them. Do not reply here.
- Remove completed requests to keep the list "fresh"
- The list is cleared every month.
- Services should not be for plugin help. Please post in #plugin-help
- Bumping requests is not permitted.
- Read full requirements here: https://helpch.at/faq/request-free
- Stick to the template below:
template: [Request] I need a plugin that spawns many Llamas over the spawn.

request-paid.topic: Request paid services - Building/Developing/Artists/SysAdmin and more. Read the pin!
channel-message: :tools: Welcome to the Paid Request Services channel!
**Template:** (Follow this template or your message will be removed)
requirements: - This is only for requesting services, do not reply to services here.
- If you wish to complete a request. DM Them. Do not reply here.
- Remove completed requests to keep the list "fresh"
- The list is cleared every month.
- Bumping requests is not permitted.
- Requests are required to have a set budget or a range (No DM for budget)
- Read full requirements here: https://helpch.at/faq/request-paid
- Stick to the template below:
template: [Request] I need a plugin that spawns many Llamas over the spawn.

rate-my-server.topic: Post your server for others to rate it! | Please don't post if you can't handle creative criticism.
channel-message: Please follow the below guidelines and formats in order to post in this channel and only request reviews if you are able to handle constructive criticism. This is not a place to advertise your server, therefore you are only allowed to post your server in here once a month.
NOTE: Website is optional, but we suggest including it.
NOTE 2: We've had issues reported to us that domains behind CloudFlares proxies don't work. If this is the case, please put the server's ip and port in the ip section instead of your domain.
requirements: - Discussion will not be tolerated in this channel. Feel free to post multiple review messages for the same server if discord's character limit is limiting you, but do not abuse the review tag by using it to start conversations.
- Bumping is strictly prohibited in this channel, any signs of it may result in a permanent mute from the service channels.
- Any hate/toxicity towards server owners or reviewers in this channel will not be tolerated. Severe punishments will be a result from these actions.
- If posting a server for another user, make sure you have their permission first, and make sure they don't also post the server in this channel.
- The list is cleared every month.
- Stick to the templates below:
template: [Description] One of a kind server to test various Spigot plugins.
[Review] All reviews must start with this tag or else they will be deleted.
rate-my-server.server-error: %s The server's ip you specified doesn't exist or https://mcapi.us is down. Please retry at a later date once these issues have been resolved.

offer-services.topic: Offer your services - Building/Developing/Artists/SysAdmin and more. Read the pin!
channel-message: :tools: Welcome to the Offer Services channel! :tools:
requirements: When posting please make sure to include some details about how to contact you and the various details of your service. This channel will only clear each month if the post threshold has been met.
template: - This channel is cleared every month, this keeps it all fresh
- You may repost your service after the monthly clear
- Bumping posts will get your permission to post here removed.
- There is not template but it is recommended you include a link to your Spigot thread if you have one.
